languages.text: "Да. Пребывание здесь будит в моем сердце... страшные желания. Нести правосудие. Вершить суд!.. Я должна обезопасить Простор от себя. Вернуться в уединение".
"Yes. Being here awakens... such terrible desires within my heart. To be the bringer of justice. The passer of verdicts! I must keep the Expanse safe from myself. I must return to my solitude."
languages.original_text: "Да. Пребывание здесь будит в моем сердце... страшные желания. Нести правосудие. Вершить суд!.. Я должна обезопасить Простор от себя. Вернуться в уединение".

traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: «Sí. Estar aquí me despierta... terribles deseos en el corazón. Ser la portadora de justicia. ¡La proclamadora de veredictos! Debo proteger la Extensión de mí misma. Regresaré a mi soledad».
languages.original_text: "Yes. Being here awakens... such terrible desires within my heart. To be the bringer of justice. The passer of verdicts! I must keep the Expanse safe from myself. I must return to my solitude."

traits.locale_text: «Sí. Estar aquí me despierta... terribles deseos en el corazón. Ser la portadora de justicia. ¡La proclamadora de veredictos! Debo proteger la Extensión de mí misma. Regresaré a mi soledad».
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: “是啊，留在这里会唤醒……我心中那些可怕的欲望。我要成为正义的使者，判决的宣告者！我必须守护科罗努斯扩区，让它免受我的伤害，我得回去独处了。”
languages.original_text: "Yes. Being here awakens... such terrible desires within my heart. To be the bringer of justice. The passer of verdicts! I must keep the Expanse safe from myself. I must return to my solitude."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，留在这里会唤醒……我心中那些可怕的欲望。我要成为正义的使者，判决的宣告者！我必须守护科罗努斯扩区，让它免受我的伤害，我得回去独处了。”
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: « Oui. Ma présence ici réveille de... terribles désirs enfouis dans mon cœur. Être celle qui fait régner la justice, qui rend son verdict ! Je dois regagner ma solitude afin de protéger les Étendues de moi-même. »
languages.original_text: "Yes. Being here awakens... such terrible desires within my heart. To be the bringer of justice. The passer of verdicts! I must keep the Expanse safe from myself. I must return to my solitude."

traits.locale_text: « Oui. Ma présence ici réveille de... terribles désirs enfouis dans mon cœur. Être celle qui fait régner la justice, qui rend son verdict ! Je dois regagner ma solitude afin de protéger les Étendues de moi-même. »
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: 「そうだ、ここにいると…恐ろしい欲望が私の心のうちに目覚める。正義をもたらす者になりたい、と。判決を下す者になると！私はエクスパンスを自分自身から守らなければならない。私は孤独に戻らなければならないのだ」
languages.original_text: "Yes. Being here awakens... such terrible desires within my heart. To be the bringer of justice. The passer of verdicts! I must keep the Expanse safe from myself. I must return to my solitude."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ、ここにいると…恐ろしい欲望が私の心のうちに目覚める。正義をもたらす者になりたい、と。判決を下す者になると！私はエクスパンスを自分自身から守らなければならない。私は孤独に戻らなければならないのだ」
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: "Ja. Hier zu sein erweckt in meinem Herzen ... solch grauenhafte Begierden. Die Bringerin der Gerechtigkeit zu sein. Die Sprecherin von Urteilen! Ich muss die Ausdehnung vor mi selbst schützen. Ich muss in meine Einsamkeit zurückkehren."
languages.original_text: "Yes. Being here awakens... such terrible desires within my heart. To be the bringer of justice. The passer of verdicts! I must keep the Expanse safe from myself. I must return to my solitude."

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Hier zu sein erweckt in meinem Herzen ... solch grauenhafte Begierden. Die Bringerin der Gerechtigkeit zu sein. Die Sprecherin von Urteilen! Ich muss die Ausdehnung vor mi selbst schützen. Ich muss in meine Einsamkeit zurückkehren."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: "Evet. Burada olmak, yüreğimde korkunç duygular uyandırıyor. Adalet getiren, kararları uygulayan olmak... Enginlik'i kendimden korumalıyım. Yalnızlığıma dönmeliyim."
languages.original_text: "Yes. Being here awakens... such terrible desires within my heart. To be the bringer of justice. The passer of verdicts! I must keep the Expanse safe from myself. I must return to my solitude."

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Burada olmak, yüreğimde korkunç duygular uyandırıyor Adalet getiren, kararları uygulayan kişi olmak... Enginlik'i kendimden korumalıyım. Yalnızlığıma geri dönmeliyim."
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion
